vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.24.16; also called Araunah at 2Sa.24.16,18,20,21,22,23,24;
Another name of or.nan (אׇרְנָן "Ornan" H0771)
§ Araunah = "I shall shout for joy" = "make ye to shine" (2Sa 24:16) or "joyful shouting of Jah" (2Sa 24:18)
a Jebusite who sold David the site for an altar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞勞拿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我應喜樂歡呼"
一位耶布斯人, 他將一塊地賣於大衛以作祭壇之用
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚劳拿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我应喜乐欢呼"
一位耶布斯人, 他将一块地卖于大卫以作祭坛之用
